import React, { useState } from "react"; import '../Style/LogIn.css' const LogInContainer = () => { const [managerMode, setManagerMode] = useState(null); const [userMode, setUserMode] = useState(null); url = "http://localhost:3000/tvs" const isManager = () => { setManagerMode(true) setUserMode(false) window.location.replace = url } const isUser = () => { setUserMode(true) setManagerMode(false) window.location.replace = url } return(

Log In

{/* */}
) } export default LogInContainer;
